GetDataExample.summary: Creates and returns the DataExample object from the DocExample object.

GetDataLinks.summary: Creates and returns the DataLinks from the DocLinks object.

GetDataParams.summary: Creates and returns the DataParams from the DocParams object.

GetDataRemark.summary: Creates and returns the DataRemark object from the DocRemarks object.

GetMemberName.summary: Retrieves the member name from the full name.

GetNamespace.summary: Retrieves the namespace from the full object name.

GetSyntax.summary: Retrieves and returns the Syntax value.
GetSyntax.param: Indicates if the Syntax string exists.

IsPublic.summary: Checks if the syntax is public.
IsPublic.param: Indicates if the Syntax string exists.
